New Records: Suryakumar Yadav won the Player-of-the-Match award for his 51* off 25 balls
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh dismissed Logan van Beek with a bouncer
Virat Kohli took a running catch to dismiss Tim Pringle
R Ashwin got the ball to drift and swing both ways, taking two wickets of Colin Ackermann and Tom Cooper
Axar Patel bowled Max O'Dowd and Bas de Leede
Suryakumar Yadav hit three fours in his first nine balls
Rohit Sharma hit a six over wide long-on in the eighth over
Pre-Game Insights: Netherlands captain Scott Edwards said it's huge to play against India at the SCG
India's captain Rohit Sharma expected the pitch at SCG to be a touch slower than the one India played Pakistan on at the MCG
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav said he was just trying to express himself when he went in to bat
India win by 56 runs and move to the top of the Group 2 table
Miscellaneous Highlights: India set a target of 180 for Netherlands
Suryakumar Yadav hit a six off the final ball to end unbeaten on 51 off 25 balls
India's other two top-order batters scored 24 off 30 between them
Others: India's NRR of 1.425, but South Africa are quite a distance ahead on that front, on 5.200
